title: ./all.bash does not continue but starts anew
body:
by **treyharris**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. run ./all.bash
2. run it again

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

It should continue from where it left off, not start over again.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
darwin 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
68ebc44e8429 tip
